description: This file defines a React component for a chat session page in a Next.js frontend. It manages chat state, server interactions, and UI rendering for a student chat interface, including message display, sending messages, uploading materials, and showing an interactive panel.

methods.name: ChatSessionPage
methods.description: Main React component function managing chat session UI and interactions.

methods.name: onSend
methods.description: Handles sending of a chat message, including optimistic UI update, error handling, and updating the chat log.
